about.subtitle: WHO'S MIRKAN?
about.title: About me

description.intro: I'm Mirkan Polat a motivated frontend developer with a clear goal: to build digital products that are not only functional but also user-friendly and visually engaging.
description.strength: My strength lies not just in technical understanding, but in the ability to solve real-world problems with well-thought-out solutions. For me, programming is not an end in itself, but a tool to turn complex requirements into tangible results.
description.qualities: Although my journey into the IT world is relatively recent, it comes with qualities that can't be taught: curiosity, perseverance, and a strong drive to grow every day. I work meticulously, think in solutions, and stay focused – especially when things get challenging.
description.goal: I'm not looking for a temporary stop, but a long-term opportunity in frontend development where I can not only contribute, but actively shape the outcome.

about.closing: Let's build software that truly makes a difference together!

skills.subtitle: MY STACK
skills.title: Skill set
skills.description: I'm passionate about creating modern, intuitive, and accessible frontend experiences. My strength lies in translating design into responsive, reliable interfaces. I embrace new tools with curiosity and strive to grow through meaningful, real-world challenges in a professional team environment.

intro.subtitle: Portfolio
intro.title: My Projects
intro.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.title: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
join.implementation: This project was implemented with Angular and TypeScript. Features include drag & drop functionality, user management, and real-time task updates. The backend uses Firebase for data persistence and user authentication.

dabubble.title: DABubble
dabubble.description: Chat application inspired by Slack. Real-time messaging with channels and direct messages.
dabubble.implementation: Built with Angular and Firebase for real-time communication. Features include channel management, direct messaging, user profiles, and file sharing capabilities.

el-pollo-loco.title: El Pollo Loco
el-pollo-loco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
el-pollo-loco.implementation: Developed using vanilla JavaScript with object-oriented programming principles. Features include collision detection, sprite animations, sound effects, and progressive game difficulty.

left.text: It was a lot of fun working with Mirkan on the Kochwelt project. He was very engaged and focused. His ideas were a great help to the team. I would definitely work with him on a project again. Thank you very much once again.

center.text: Mirkan still impresses me with his energy and perseverance even after months. In our project, he was always ready to pitch in, even late at night when things got stressful. He always stayed positive, open and strengthened the team spirit with his manner.

right.text: Mirkan is a great team colleague at DA. His positive attitude and willingness to take on challenges made a significant contribution to us achieving our goals.
